comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Cannot reproduce with your config (except the custom filters list and userscripts).
Please visit https://search.shopping.naver.com and search again.

issue.body:

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.peacocktv.com/watch/playback/vod/GMO_00000000105482_01/5632b976-0dba-30e3-afbc-bbdb379c401a](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.peacocktv.com%2Fwatch%2Fplayback%2Fvod%2FGMO_00000000105482_01%2F5632b976-0dba-30e3-afbc-bbdb379c401a) ### Comment > Previously have had no issues with adguard and it worked great and blocked all ads on peacock. Today it randomly started allowing peacock ads to go thorugh and would like a solution to this please. I've tried restarted my computer, updating everything, uninstall and reinstall the app, as well as added the adguard extra extension and it is not working ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/jz4snbzrklc000s4s48s8wk4o04kgwc5aw92askhqw.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/rnbb0eqbydwog4kg044ocggwg484owc6ubc3w20yn8.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.1.116 MV3 System version: | `Windows 11` Browser: | Chrome Tracking protection: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Other extensions used: | `none`
